column4: I am trying to get a machine running Xubuntu to connect to a wireless network using a Linksys card
I have the network added, and everything seems fine, except the network isn't showing u[p

just an FYI - perhaps doesn't apply to you - when I first install with one of my Linksys card I need to use a wired connection - do the updates - THEN I can go to Hardware Drivers and enable my wireless card.  Just something to think about.
